AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.bus: Used to transport undocumented aliens from Sabinas Hidalgo to Nuevo Laredo on November 22, 1980
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.taxi: Used to transport undocumented aliens from the Nuevo Laredo bus terminal to a point close to the bridge leading into the United States on November 22, 1980
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.van: Used to smuggle undocumented aliens across the border with a hidden compartment, driven by Ramon Gonzalez Sanchez, and employed in multiple trips including November 22, 1980; inspected at the bridge with a discovered hidden compartment
